String.string: You have found the Queen's Lair Entrance.
Go to the Queen's Lair Entrance, found near the northeast teleport platform in Granarkus.
Enter Argon Corpus and find Shandra Manaya.
Defeat Cygnus, fist of Manaya, to get one step closer to finding Shandra Manaya.
Defeat the halveterak overseer to get one step closer to finding Shandra Manaya.
Defeat lokmar sorgalur to get one step closer to finding Shandra Manaya.
Defeat Meldita, eye of Manaya, to get one step closer to finding Shandra Manaya.
Eliminate Shandra Manaya, the argon queen, in Manaya's Core.
Tell Kaia you killed Shandra Manaya.
